lyrics.lyric: Love The Way You Lie
lyrics.tlyric: 爱你说谎的方式

lyrics.lyric: Just gonna stand there and watch me burn
lyrics.tlyric: 就站在那里看着我燃烧殆尽吧

lyrics.lyric: Well, that's alright because I like the way it hurts
lyrics.tlyric: 但是没关系，因为我爱这种伤害的方式

lyrics.lyric: Just gonna stand there and hear me cry
lyrics.tlyric: 就站在那里听着我哭泣吧

lyrics.lyric: Well, that's alright because I love the way you lie, I love the way you lie
lyrics.tlyric: 没有关系，因为我爱你说谎的样子

lyrics.lyric: I can't tell you what it really is
lyrics.tlyric: 我无法说出这到底是什么

lyrics.lyric: I can only tell you what it feels like
lyrics.tlyric: 我只能告诉你这是什么样的感觉

lyrics.lyric: And right now, it's a steel knife in my windpipe
lyrics.tlyric: 此刻我的气管里就像有一把钢刃

lyrics.lyric: I can't breathe, but I still fight while I can fight
lyrics.tlyric: 我无法呼吸，但我仍在挣扎，趁着我还有余力

lyrics.lyric: As long as the wrong feels right it's like I'm in flight
lyrics.tlyric: 只要我觉得错的也是对的，已经麻木了，就像被驾到高空而没有知觉

lyrics.lyric: High off her love, drunk from my hate
lyrics.tlyric: 她的爱让我无法自拔，她对我的恨更让我上瘾

lyrics.lyric: It's like I'm huffing paint and I love her, the more I suffer, I suffocate
lyrics.tlyric: 就像我染上了毒瘾，沉得越久，伤得越深

lyrics.lyric: And right before I'm about to drown, she resuscitates me
lyrics.tlyric: 而就在我快要被淹没时，她将我救赎

lyrics.lyric: She ****ing hates me and I love it
lyrics.tlyric: 她如此厌恶我，而我还犯贱就喜欢那样

lyrics.lyric: Wait! Where you going? I'm leaving you
lyrics.tlyric: 等等！你去哪！我要离开你

lyrics.lyric: No you ain't, come back, we're running right back
lyrics.tlyric: 不，你不能离开。回来！我们可以从头再来

lyrics.lyric: Here we go again
lyrics.tlyric: 我们重新来过

lyrics.lyric: It's so insane 'cause when it's going good, it's going great
lyrics.tlyric: 这太疯狂，因为当一切就要变得好起来

lyrics.lyric: I'm Superman with the wind at his back
lyrics.tlyric: 我像超人般飞在空中，所向披靡

lyrics.lyric: She's Lois Lane, but when it's bad, it's awful, I feel so ashamed, I snapped
lyrics.tlyric: 她就像Lois Lane（超人女友），糟糕的时候一塌糊涂我都感到羞耻

lyrics.lyric: Who's that dude? I don't even know his name
lyrics.tlyric: “那小子是谁，我甚至不知道他的名字”

lyrics.lyric: I laid hands on her, I'll never stoop so low again
lyrics.tlyric: 我打了她，我再也不会如此卑躬屈膝，尊严沦丧

lyrics.lyric: I guess I don't know my own strength
lyrics.tlyric: 我都不知道我下手有多狠

lyrics.lyric: Just gonna stand there and watch me burn
lyrics.tlyric: 就站在那里看着我燃烧殆尽吧

lyrics.lyric: Well, that's alright because I like the way it hurts
lyrics.tlyric: 但是没关系，因为我爱这种伤害的方式

lyrics.lyric: Just gonna stand there and hear me cry
lyrics.tlyric: 就站在那里听着我哭泣吧

lyrics.lyric: Well, that's alright because I love the way you lie, I love the way you lie, I love the way you lie
lyrics.tlyric: 没关系，我喜欢你说谎的样子

lyrics.lyric: You ever love somebody so much, you can barely breathe
lyrics.tlyric: 你是否曾那样深爱一个人，爱得无法呼吸

lyrics.lyric: When you're with them
lyrics.tlyric: 当你和他们在一起的时候

lyrics.lyric: You meet, and neither one of you even know what hit 'em
lyrics.tlyric: 你遇到了，你们谁都不知道是什么击中了他们

lyrics.lyric: Got that warm, fuzzy feeling
lyrics.tlyric: 拥有了那样温暖又朦胧的感觉

lyrics.lyric: Yeah, them chills, used to get 'em
lyrics.tlyric: 是的，他们让你放松，不断吸引着你

lyrics.lyric: Now you're getting ****ing sick of looking at 'em
lyrics.tlyric: 但你现在看到就想吐

lyrics.lyric: You swore you'd never hit 'em, never do nothing to hurt 'em
lyrics.tlyric: 你发誓永远不会打他们，永远不会伤害他们

lyrics.lyric: Now you're in each other's face, spewing venom in your words when you spit 'em
lyrics.tlyric: 但现在你们看见对方都感到恶心，连说句话都喷射着毒液

lyrics.lyric: You push, pull each other's hair, scratch, claw, bit 'em
lyrics.tlyric: 你们扯着对方的头发，扭打成团，互相殴打

lyrics.lyric: Throw 'em down, pin 'em
lyrics.tlyric: 蹂躏着他，像用针一样刺痛他

lyrics.lyric: So lost in the moments when you're in 'em
lyrics.tlyric: 你们在那一刻中迷失自我

lyrics.lyric: It's a rage that's the culprit, it controls you both
lyrics.tlyric: 愤怒是罪魁祸首，它控制着你们

lyrics.lyric: So they say you're best to go your separate ways
lyrics.tlyric: 所以旁人说着，你们最好还是分开

lyrics.lyric: Guess that they don't know ya 'cause today, that was yesterday
lyrics.tlyric: 我猜他们不了解你，因为今朝就是昨日的重演

lyrics.lyric: Yesterday is over, it's a different day
lyrics.tlyric: 昨日已经终结，这是另一个今天

lyrics.lyric: Sound like broken records playing over, but you promised her
lyrics.tlyric: 听起来就像破唱片机一样一遍又一遍的重复，但你承诺过她

lyrics.lyric: Next time, you'll show restraint
lyrics.tlyric: 下次你会克制

lyrics.lyric: You don't get another chance
lyrics.tlyric: 不然你们之间就没有机会了

lyrics.lyric: Life is no Nintendo game
lyrics.tlyric: 生活不是任天堂游戏

lyrics.lyric: But you lied again
lyrics.tlyric: 但你又一次食言

lyrics.lyric: Now you get to watch her leave out the window
lyrics.tlyric: 现在你只能从窗口看着她离开

lyrics.lyric: Guess that's why they call it window pane
lyrics.tlyric: 怕这便是“窗伤”吧（pain在英文中与玻璃板(pane)谐音）

lyrics.lyric: Just gonna stand there and watch me burn
lyrics.tlyric: 就站在那里看着我燃烧殆尽吧

lyrics.lyric: Well, that's alright because I like the way it hurts
lyrics.tlyric: 但是没关系，因为我爱这种伤害的方式

lyrics.lyric: Just gonna stand there and hear me cry
lyrics.tlyric: 就站在那里听着我哭泣吧

lyrics.lyric: Well, that's alright because I love the way you lie, I love the way you lie, I love the way you lie
lyrics.tlyric: 没关系，我喜欢你说谎的样子

lyrics.lyric: Now, I know we said things did things that we didn't mean
lyrics.tlyric: 现在我明白了人们说的口是心非，身不由己

lyrics.lyric: And we fall back into the same patterns, same routine
lyrics.tlyric: 而我们又玩起了老花样，开始了同样的日常

lyrics.lyric: But your temper's just as bad as mine is
lyrics.tlyric: 但你脾气跟我一样坏

lyrics.lyric: You're the same as me
lyrics.tlyric: 你和我简直一模一样

lyrics.lyric: When it comes to love, you're just as blinded
lyrics.tlyric: 但谈及爱情，你就像被蒙蔽了双眼

lyrics.lyric: Baby, please, come back
lyrics.tlyric: 宝贝，求你回来我身边

lyrics.lyric: It wasn't you, baby, it was me
lyrics.tlyric: 宝贝，都是我的错，与你无关

lyrics.lyric: Maybe our relationship isn't as crazy as it seems
lyrics.tlyric: 也许我们之间的关系还没有看起来的那么离谱

lyrics.lyric: Maybe that's what happens when a tornado meets a volcano
lyrics.tlyric: 也许那就是火山爆发遇上龙卷风时的样子

lyrics.lyric: All I know is I love you too much to walk away though
lyrics.tlyric: 我所知道的就是我爱你爱得无法自拔

lyrics.lyric: Come inside, pick up your bags off the sidewalk
lyrics.tlyric: 回家吧，拿上你路边的行李回家吧。

lyrics.lyric: Don't you hear sincerity in my voice when I talk
lyrics.tlyric: 难道你没有听见我说话时声音里的真诚吗？

lyrics.lyric: Told you this is my fault
lyrics.tlyric: 说了这都是我的错

lyrics.lyric: Look me in the eyeball
lyrics.tlyric: 看着我的眼睛

lyrics.lyric: Next time I'm pissed, I'll aim my fist at the dry wall
lyrics.tlyric: 下一次我愤怒的时候，我只会把拳头对准墙壁

lyrics.lyric: Next time, there will be no next time
lyrics.tlyric: 下次？不会再有下次

lyrics.lyric: I apologize, even though I know it's lies
lyrics.tlyric: 我向你道歉，即使我知道这是谎言

lyrics.lyric: I'm tired of the games, I just want her back
lyrics.tlyric: 我已经厌倦了这场游戏，我只是想要她回来

lyrics.lyric: I know I'm a liar
lyrics.tlyric: 我知道我是个骗子

lyrics.lyric: If she ever tries to ****ing leave again
lyrics.tlyric: 如果她还想再次离开我

lyrics.lyric: I'ma tie her to the bed and set this house on fire
lyrics.tlyric: 我会把她绑在床上，然后烧了这座房子

lyrics.lyric: Just gonna stand there and watch me burn
lyrics.tlyric: 就站在那里看着我燃烧殆尽吧

lyrics.lyric: Well, that's alright because I like the way it hurts
lyrics.tlyric: 但是没关系，因为我爱这种伤害的方式

lyrics.lyric: Just gonna stand there and hear me cry
lyrics.tlyric: 就站在那里听着我哭泣吧

lyrics.lyric: Well, that's alright because I love the way you lie, I love the way you lie
lyrics.tlyric: 没有关系，因为我爱你说谎的样子

lyrics.lyric: I love the way you lie
lyrics.tlyric: 我喜欢你说谎的样子

lrc.lyric:
[00:00.000] 作词 : Alex Da Kid/Skylar Grey/Eminem
[00:00.100] 作曲 : Marshall Mathers/Alexander Grant/Holly Hafermann
[00:00.200] 制作人 : Alex Da Kid/Makeba Riddick
[00:00.300]Just gonna stand there and watch me burn
[00:05.350]Well, that's alright because I like the way it hurts
[00:11.230]Just gonna stand there and hear me cry
[00:16.260]Well, that's alright because I love the way you lie, I love the way you lie
[00:25.130]I can't tell you what it really is
[00:26.890]I can only tell you what it feels like
[00:28.930]And right now, it's a steel knife in my windpipe
[00:31.550]I can't breathe, but I still fight while I can fight
[00:34.440]As long as the wrong feels right it's like I'm in flight
[00:37.440]High off her love, drunk from my hate
[00:39.220]It's like I'm huffing paint and I love her, the more I suffer, I suffocate
[00:42.770]And right before I'm about to drown, she resuscitates me
[00:46.000]She ******* hates me and I love it
[00:47.850]Wait! Where you going? I'm leaving you
[00:50.260]No you ain't, come back, we're running right back
[00:52.850]Here we go again
[00:53.790]It's so insane 'cause when it's going good, it's going great
[00:56.530]I'm Superman with the wind at his back
[00:58.490]She's Lois Lane, but when it's bad, it's awful, I feel so ashamed, I snapped
[01:02.640]Who's that dude? I don't even know his name
[01:04.800]I laid hands on her, I'll never stoop so low again
[01:07.500]I guess I don't know my own strength
[01:09.490]Just gonna stand there and watch me burn
[01:14.200]Well, that's alright because I like the way it hurts
[01:20.500]Just gonna stand there and hear me cry
[01:25.290]Well, that's alright because I love the way you lie, I love the way you lie, I love the way you lie
[01:42.800]You ever love somebody so much, you can barely breathe
[01:45.320]When you're with them
[01:46.050]You meet, and neither one of you even know what hit 'em
[01:48.540]Got that warm, fuzzy feeling
[01:50.090]Yeah, them chills, used to get 'em
[01:51.360]Now you're getting ******* sick of looking at 'em
[01:53.730]You swore you'd never hit 'em, never do nothing to hurt 'em
[01:56.370]Now you're in each other's face, spewing venom in your words when you spit 'em
[02:00.000]You push, pull each other's hair, scratch, claw, bit 'em
[02:02.440]Throw 'em down, pin 'em
[02:03.370]So lost in the moments when you're in 'em
[02:05.260]It's a rage that's the culprit, it controls you both
[02:07.580]So they say you're best to go your separate ways
[02:09.730]Guess that they don't know ya 'cause today, that was yesterday
[02:12.320]Yesterday is over, it's a different day
[02:14.430]Sound like broken records playing over, but you promised her
[02:17.180]Next time, you'll show restraint
[02:18.740]You don't get another chance
[02:19.920]Life is no Nintendo game
[02:21.450]But you lied again
[02:22.430]Now you get to watch her leave out the window
[02:24.500]Guess that's why they call it window pane
[02:26.650]Just gonna stand there and watch me burn
[02:31.440]Well, that's alright because I like the way it hurts
[02:37.690]Just gonna stand there and hear me cry
[02:42.520]Well, that's alright because I love the way you lie, I love the way you lie, I love the way you lie
[03:00.130]Now, I know we said things did things that we didn't mean
[03:03.150]And we fall back into the same patterns, same routine
[03:06.420]But your temper's just as bad as mine is
[03:07.940]You're the same as me
[03:09.000]When it comes to love, you're just as blinded
[03:11.020]Baby, please, come back
[03:12.270]It wasn't you, baby, it was me
[03:14.110]Maybe our relationship isn't as crazy as it seems
[03:16.820]Maybe that's what happens when a tornado meets a volcano
[03:19.910]All I know is I love you too much to walk away though
[03:22.910]Come inside, pick up your bags off the sidewalk
[03:25.500]Don't you hear sincerity in my voice when I talk
[03:28.180]Told you this is my fault
[03:29.470]Look me in the eyeball
[03:30.880]Next time I'm pissed, I'll aim my fist at the dry wall
[03:33.780]Next time, there will be no next time
[03:35.850]I apologize, even though I know it's lies
[03:38.580]I'm tired of the games, I just want her back
[03:40.710]I know I'm a liar
[03:41.830]If she ever tries to ******* leave again
[03:43.780]I'ma tie her to the bed and set this house on fire
[03:46.510]Just gonna stand there and watch me burn
[03:51.600]Well, that's alright because I like the way it hurts
[03:57.520]Just gonna stand there and hear me cry
[04:02.690]Well, that's alright because I love the way you lie, I love the way you lie
[04:13.670]I love the way you lie

tlyric.lyric:
[00:00.300]静静看着我烧尽吧
[00:05.350]没关系，我喜欢这伤痛
[00:11.230]静静听着我抽泣吧
[00:16.260]没关系，我喜欢你说谎的样子
[00:25.130]我说不出这心情
[00:26.890]只吐得出这感觉
[00:28.930]就现在喉头刺痛，张弛不得
[00:31.550]近乎窒息，但我还能站起来
[00:34.440]只要这剧痛不止，便如钢刀悉数落来
[00:37.440]以恨浇仇，昏天黑地
[00:39.220]这爱罪恶，越深入，越无法回头
[00:42.770]在我如此狼狈的前一秒，她还让我站在黄金时代
[00:46.000]我还犯贱地爱着她，她还他的恨我
[00:47.850]“等等！你要去哪”“永远不见”
[00:50.260]“别，别这样，我错了”
[00:52.850]你一次次这样折磨我
[00:53.790]这难以置信，当我们和好，便似天堂
[00:56.530]我像超人般飞在空中
[00:58.490]你就是Lois Lane（超人女友）
[01:02.640]“那男的是谁，我连他名字都不知道”
[01:04.800]我用我的手打了她，我再也不会做那种事
[01:07.500]但我也不知道我究竟有多狠
[01:09.490]静静看着我烧尽吧
[01:14.200]没关系，我喜欢这伤痛
[01:20.500]静静听着我抽泣吧
[01:25.290]没关系，我喜欢你说谎的样子
[01:42.800]从没经历这么刻骨的爱，超过窒息之痛
[01:45.320]当你爱着她时
[01:46.050]你就会见到你从没见过的东西
[01:48.540]这模糊而温暖的暧昧
[01:50.090]就是它们不断吸引着你
[01:51.360]但现在看到就想吐
[01:53.730]你发誓让着他，爱着他
[01:56.370]但现在，恨不得吐出有毒的酸液把他化成血脓
[02:00.000]扯着头发，抓着脸
[02:02.440]摔东西，更甚至用针刺
[02:03.370]当你这么做时，你已经疯了
[02:05.260]怒火已经完全控制了你
[02:07.580]所以旁人建议你们分开冷静下
[02:09.730]他们是不是不知道你今天又这样疯狂
[02:12.320]昨天已经过去，今天不再是过去
[02:14.430]滥调陈词，但你向她承诺过
[02:17.180]下次你会克制
[02:18.740]你们不给彼此机会
[02:19.920]生活不是任天堂游戏
[02:21.450]你为什么一次次食言
[02:22.430]现在你只得透过窗子看她离去
[02:24.500]怕这便是“窗伤”吧（pain在英文中与玻璃板(pane)谐音）
[02:26.650]静静看着我烧尽吧
[02:31.440]没关系，我喜欢这伤痛
[02:37.690]静静听着我抽泣吧
[02:42.520]没关系，我喜欢你说谎的样子
[03:00.130]现在我知道无心究竟能引起多少连锁反应
[03:03.150]我们再次扭打再次争吵
[03:06.420]我们互不相让
[03:07.940]你和我简直一模一样
[03:09.000]但在爱情方面，你却盲目
[03:11.020]回来吧，  宝贝
[03:12.270]我的错，你是对的，宝贝
[03:14.110]也许还不到这一步
[03:16.820]也许只是糟到火山遇上龙卷风般
[03:19.910]我知道我离不开你
[03:22.910]回来吧，把你的行李提回来吧
[03:25.500]你听不到我的真诚吗？
[03:28.180]我说了这是我的错
[03:29.470]看着我
[03:30.880]下次我的怒火，会让这拳头砸在墙上
[03:33.780]下次？不会再有下次
[03:35.850]我向你道歉，我知道这是谎言
[03:38.580]我不想再这样了，我只想让她回来
[03:40.710]我知道我是个骗子
[03:41.830]如果她他的再试着跑
[03:43.780]我就把她拴在床上，然后烧了这房子
[03:46.510]静静看着我烧尽吧
[03:51.600]没关系，我喜欢这伤痛
[03:57.520]静静听着我抽泣吧
[04:02.690]没关系，我喜欢你说谎的样子
[04:13.670]我喜欢你说谎的样子
